text: The Joyous Liar is a 1919 American silent comedy film directed by Ernest C. Warde and starring J. Warren Kerrigan, Lillian Walker, and Joseph J. Dowling.Flowers & Frizler p.314 ==Cast== * J. Warren Kerrigan as Burke Harlan * Lillian Walker as Anne Warren * Joseph J. Dowling as Wilbur Warren * Albert R. Cody as James Roth * Pell Trenton as Jimmy MacDonald * Alfred Hollingsworth as James MacDonald ==References== ==Bibliography== * John Flowers and Paul Frizler. Psychotherapists on Film, 1899-1999: A Worldwide Guide to Over 5000 Films, Volume 1. McFarland, 2004. ==External links== * * Category:1919 films Category:1919 comedy films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:Films directed by Ernest C. Warde Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Films distributed by W.W. Hodkinson Distribution
title: The Joyous Liar
